snippet: As the Christie episode shows, the authority increasingly runs on politics, not professionalism.
abstract: Editorial contends traffic jam scandal surrounding New Jersey Gov Chris Christie has cast spotlight on the Port Authority of New York and New Jersey; holds authority is sprawling, secretive agency that runs on politics rather than professionalism; proposes reforms that would help rid agency of cronyism and provide greater transparency.
lead_paragraph: As the Christie episode shows, the authority increasingly runs on politics, not professionalism.
